title: Com Hem
snippet: Q3 Announcement 2025 · Presentation · Webcast · Transcript · Divestment · EQT III acquired Com Hem AB, a Swedish cable TV operator, in 2003. Com Hem was one of the largest operators in Sweden, offering pay-TV and broadband internet access as the leading player in an attractive market.
